data.name: ROUGH KUTS: 3D Demo
data.detailed_description:
ROUGH KUTS: 3D (RK3D) is a First Person Shooter, inspired by old public domain horror movies from the 60s & 70s.

This demo lets you roam the cinema lobby & play DEVIL TIMES FIVE to collect 9 lost reels.

Features:
  • Sandbox style levels roughly inspired by public domain classic horror movies.
  • Bunch of weapons / monsters / zombies / enemies.
  • Bunch of lost film reels in each level to collect.
  • Thumping electronica soundtrack.

Collect ammo and blast everything in sight or explore cautiously. Up to you.

RK3D (ie 'REKT') is old school fun, and is inspired by old school films and old school deathmatch maps, and is a fun companion piece to the Rough Kuts Interactive Film (FMV) series also available on Steam.

SOUNDTRACK ALSO AVAILABLE in 320kbps Quality (Over 3 Hours of Thumping Electronica)

data.short_description: First Person Shooter. Enjoy the Cinema Lobby & Play DEVIL TIMES FIVE to collect 9 lost film reels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
